name: GetCaseByID
description: Gets a case by its ID.
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `Cases:View`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

B.name: ID
B.description: This is the ID of a `Case`

D.name: ID
D.description: This is the ID of a `Blob`

E.name: TopicID
E.description: This is the ID of a `CaseTopic`

F.name: ID
F.description: This is the ID of a `User`

I.name: DateTimeValue
I.description: Used for datatype DateTime and Date

I.name: NumberValue
I.description: Used for datatype Integer and Decimal

I.name: StringValue
I.description: Used for datatype String, Text and Enum

J.name: ID
J.description: This is the ID of a `User`

K.name: Code
K.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

K.name: Message
K.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

K.name: RequestID
K.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

K.name: Type
K.description: A short description of the error type.

L.name: ExternalIDs
L.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

L.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
L.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

L.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
L.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.

N.name: BackendID
N.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

N.name: ID
N.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

N.name: Status
N.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - PreRelease
* `4` - DeliveryOnly
* `8` - DisableDelivery
* `16` - DisablePickup
* `32` - DisableBackorder
* `34` - UseUp
* `64` - NonSellable

N.name: Type
N.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Stock
* `2` - Insurance
* `4` - Marketing
* `8` - GiftCard
* `16` - Service
* `32` - GreetingCard
* `64` - CustomPricing
* `128` - External
* `256` - OrderCosts
* `512` - SystemGenerated
* `1024` - ProductSet
* `2048` - BundleProduct
* `4096` - VirtualProduct
* `8192` - MadeToOrder
* `16384` - Configurable
* `32768` - SupplierProduct
* `65536` - Template
* `131072` - SecondChance
* `262144` - NotReturnable

M.name: ID
M.description: This is the ID of a `CaseRelatedItem`

M.name: OrderLineID
M.description: This is the ID of a `OrderLine`

M.name: ProductID
M.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

V.name: ID
V.description: This is the ID of a `Enum`

V.name: Name
V.description: Usually an internal & unchangable code - for display, use `Description`

U.name: ID
U.description: This is the ID of a `RepairTask`

T.name: ID
T.description: This is the ID of a `Repair`

T.name: Status
T.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - WaitingForGoods
* `1` - WaitingForRepair
* `2` - WaitingForPayment
* `3` - WaitingForShipment
* `4` - Finished
* `5` - Cancelled
* `6` - WaitingForPickup
* `7` - Started
* `8` - WaitingForGoods_OnHold
* `9` - WaitingForRepair_OnHold
* `10` - WaitingForShipment_OnHold

C.name: AssignedOrganizationUnitID
C.description: This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnit`

C.name: AssigneeID
C.description: This is the ID of a `User`

C.name: BlobIDs
C.description: This is the ID of a `Blob`

C.name: CustomFieldValuesWithOptions
C.description: This is the ID of a `CustomField`

C.name: ID
C.description: This is the ID of a `Case`

C.name: OrderID
C.description: This is the ID of a `Order`

C.name: OriginatingOrganizationUnitID
C.description: This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnit`

C.name: Priority
C.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - Low
* `1` - Medium
* `2` - High
* `9` - Critical

C.name: StatusID
C.description: This is the ID of a `CaseStatus`

C.name: SummaryLastModifiedByID
C.description: This is the ID of a `User`
